title: Outer Harbor Line: Man dies after mobility scooter rolls on to tracks
text:
A man has died after his mobility scooter rolled off a train platform and on to tracks at a station north west of Adelaide.

Emergency services were called to Osborne Train Station just after 2.30pm after receiving reports of a man and his scooter on the tracks.

The unconscious man was treated at the scene but died a short time later.

He was not hit by a train.

A train on the Outer Harbor Line was forced to stop as a result of the incident.

Police and emergency services remain at the scene as a report is prepared for the coroner.
description: A man has died after his mobility scooter rolled off a train platform on the Outer Harbor Line.
